type: Various Pins for Victoria Class Submarines
short_summary: The DND requires various pins for the Victoria Class Submarines. Delivery to CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.
description: The DND needs various types of pins spare as listed below. Delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax . Item 1 GSIN: 5315 NSN: 20-A0X1961 SHEAR PIN - SHEAR PIN LEVER
full_summary:
# Various Pins for Victoria Class Submarines
### Description
The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the procurement of various pins for the Victoria Class Submarines. The pins are required for delivery at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.

### Items
The following items are required:

| **Item #** | **Description** | **Quantity** | **Unit of Issue** | **Delivery Location** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Shear Pin - Shear Pin Lever | 8 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| 2 | Shear Pin - Shear Pin Lever | 4 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| 3 | Pin-Crank | 8 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| 4 | Pin-Crank | 4 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| 5 | Pivot Pin - Interlock Switch | 8 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| 6 | Pivot Pin - Interlock Switch | 4 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| 7 | Pivot Pin - Aft Planes | 8 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| 8 | Pivot Pin - Aft Planes | 4 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| 9 | Clevis Pin - Aft Planes | 8 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| 10 | Clevis Pin - Aft Planes | 4 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| 11 | Link Pin - Aft Planes | 8 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| 12 | Link Pin - Aft Planes | 4 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| 13 | Pin Location - Aft Planes | 8 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| 14 | Pin Location - Aft Planes | 4 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| 15 | Pivot Pin - Centering Lever | 8 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| 16 | Pivot Pin - Centering Lever | 4 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| 17 | Pin - Centering Lever | 8 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| 18 | Pin - Centering Lever | 4 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| 19 | Pin - Centering Spool | 8 | EA | CFB Esquimal
